name: RetrieveInventoryAdjustment
description:
Returns the [InventoryAdjustment](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/objects/InventoryAdjustment) object
with the provided `adjustment_id`.

$ul: **adjustment**: Represents a change in state or quantity of product inventory at a
**adjustment_group**:
**from_state**: Representative `from_state` for adjustments within the group. For example, for a group adjustment from `IN_STOCK` to `SOLD`,
**id**: A unique ID generated by Square for the
**root_adjustment_id**: The inventory adjustment of the composed variation.
**to_state**: Representative `to_state` for adjustments within group. For example, for a group adjustment from `IN_STOCK` to `SOLD`,
**catalog_object_id**: The Square-generated ID of the
**catalog_object_type**: The [type](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/enums/CatalogObjectType) of the
**created_at**: An RFC 3339-formatted timestamp that indicates when the inventory adjustment is received.
**employee_id**: The Square-generated ID of the [Employee](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/objects/Employee) responsible for the
**from_state**: The [inventory state](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/enums/InventoryState) of the related quantity
**goods_receipt_id**: The Square-generated ID of the goods receipt that caused the
**id**: A unique ID generated by Square for the
**location_id**: The Square-generated ID of the [Location](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/objects/Location) where the related
**occurred_at**: A client-generated RFC 3339-formatted timestamp that indicates when
**purchase_order_id**: The Square-generated ID of the purchase order that caused the
**quantity**: The number of items affected by the adjustment as a decimal string.
**reference_id**: An optional ID provided by the application to tie the
**refund_id**: The Square-generated ID of the [Refund][#type-refund] that
**source**: Provides information about the application used to generate a change.
**application_id**: Read-only Square ID assigned to the application. Only used for
**name**: Read-only display name assigned to the application
**product**: Read-only [Product](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/enums/Product) type for the application.
**to_state**: The [inventory state](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/enums/InventoryState) of the related quantity
**total_price_money**: Represents an amount of money. `Money` fields can be signed or unsigned.
**amount**: The amount of money, in the smallest denomination of the currency
**currency**: The type of currency, in __ISO 4217 format__. For example, the currency
**transaction_id**: The Square-generated ID of the [Transaction][#type-transaction] that
**errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
